ropes.name: Sheet
ropes.purpose: Controls the angle of a sail relative to the wind.

ropes.name: Halyard
ropes.purpose: Used to hoist or lower sails.

ropes.name: Stay
ropes.purpose: Fore-and-aft support lines for the mast.

ropes.name: Shroud
ropes.purpose: Side-to-side support lines for the mast.

ropes.name: Topping lift
ropes.purpose: Raises or supports the boom when the sail is down.

ropes.name: Downhaul
ropes.purpose: Pulls the sail downward on the mast.

ropes.name: Outhaul
ropes.purpose: Tensions the sail along the boom.

ropes.name: Painter
ropes.purpose: Line tied to the bow, used to tow or secure a small boat.

ropes.name: Lazy jacks
ropes.purpose: Guide the sail as it’s lowered; used in some gaff rigs.

vessels.name: Barque
vessels.rig: Square fore and main, fore-and-aft mizzen

points_of_sail.name: Close-hauled
points_of_sail.description: Sailing into the wind; most upwind point of sail.

points_of_sail.name: Beam reach
points_of_sail.description: Wind from the side; usually the fastest point of sail.

points_of_sail.name: Broad reach
points_of_sail.description: Wind from behind and to the side; stable and fast.

points_of_sail.name: Running
points_of_sail.description: Wind directly behind; slower and less stable.

points_of_sail.name: In irons
points_of_sail.description: Pointed directly into the wind; boat stalls.

points_of_sail.name: Tacking
points_of_sail.description: Zig-zag motion to sail upwind by alternating sides.

points_of_sail.name: Jibing
points_of_sail.description: Changing tack with the wind from behind.

schooner_parts.name: Foremast
schooner_parts.description: Forward mast, typically shorter than mainmast.

schooner_parts.name: Mainmast
schooner_parts.description: Rear mast, tallest on a schooner.

schooner_parts.name: Gaff
schooner_parts.description: Diagonal spar that holds the top of a fore-and-aft sail.

schooner_parts.name: Boom
schooner_parts.description: Horizontal spar at the foot of a sail.

schooner_parts.name: Wheel
schooner_parts.description: Used to steer the ship; controls rudder via chains or hydraulics.

schooner_parts.name: Capstan
schooner_parts.description: Rotating winch for lifting anchors or heavy loads.

schooner_parts.name: Bilge
schooner_parts.description: Lowest point in the hull where water collects.

shanty_themes.description: Leader sings a line, crew responds; coordinates effort.
Sung during labor, such as raising sails or turning the capstan.
Songs of longing for land and loved ones.
Songs of liberty, port mischief, and escape.
Songs about the danger and reward of the sea trades.
Prayers, laments, and ballads of loss at sea.
